title: BDL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 156 Trade Apprentices Posts
description: The Bharat Dynamics Limited (BDL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 156 Trade Apprentices Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th and ITI can apply for the BDL Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, a...
